text.p: Cotelligent Group Inc said on Wednesday it completed the acquisition of an informational technology consulting firm with offices in two cities for $8.7 million.

The acquired company, with operations in Cleveland and Ft. Lauderdale, had unaudited revenues of $8.7 million and unaudited income before taxes of approximately $350,000 for their most recent fiscal year, Cotelligent said. The name of the acquired company was not disclosed.
This acquisition will be accounted for as a pooling-of-interests, the company said.

Cotelligent's restated combined pro forma revenue, resulting from the acquisition for the year ended March 31, 1996 is $88.9 million, restated combined pro forma net income for the year is $3.1 million and restated pro forma earnings per share is $.50.
Cotelligent Group also said it increased its credit line to $20 million from $10 million. The credit line will support expanded operations and acquisitions, the company said.
